argument.name: position
argument.description: The bit position to write to.

page.description: Pook 1-bit of data, offset in bits starting at 1.
page.discussion: The .POKEBIT() method writes a bit Value into Position.The .POKEBIT() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob.
page.example: dim bb as B bb = "A" bb.pokebit(3, 1) ? bb = E
